```{r slideshow, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, layout="l-screen", fig.height=8.5, out.width='100%', fig.align='center'}
library(htmlwidgets)
library(slickR)

# Get image locations from slideshow directory.
# Add images to the slideshow directory and they will be displayed here.
slideshow_image_paths <- paste0("images/slideshow/", list.files("images/slideshow"))

# Build the slideshow using the slickR package.
slickR(obj = slideshow_image_paths, height = "800px", width = "100%") + 
  settings(arrows = TRUE, dots = TRUE, autoplay = TRUE, autoplaySpeed = 3000, adaptiveHeight = FALSE)
```
